definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: The terminal is used in conjunction with a photographic typesetter.
sentences.chinese: 这种终端与照相排版机一起使用。

sentences.english: When the terminal has an alarm, the terminal will automatically transmit the location information to the management center.
sentences.chinese: 终端出现警情时，终端自动将位置信息传给管理中心。

sentences.english: When the terminal has an alarm, the terminal will automatically transmit the location information to the management center.
sentences.chinese: 终端出现警情时，终端自动将位置信息传给管理中心。

sentences.english: It does this by challenging the end user for credentials.
sentences.chinese: 为此，它要求终端用户提供凭据。

sentences.english: This is a two-node cluster, and you have a third system that will be your administrative console.
sentences.chinese: 这是双节点集群，并且你有另外系统作为管理终端。

sentences.english: End-user requirements may be fuzzy or incomplete.
sentences.chinese: 终端用户的需求可能是模糊或不完整的。

sentences.english: We studied and implemented the data transmission protocol for remote data terminals.
sentences.chinese: 针对远程数据终端的协议进行了研究与实现。

sentences.english: UIM Card is specially designed for CDMA mobile terminal identification.
sentences.chinese: UIM卡用于CDMA网络中移动终端的身份识别。

sentences.english: In the area of WAP, smart phones are meant to be the winner of terminals.
sentences.chinese: 无线互联时代，智能手机注定成为新的终端王者。

sentences.english: Typing a password into the dialog will send it to the terminal.
sentences.chinese: 在对话框中输入的密码将发送到终端。

sentences.english: Asymptote's design features two towers with a terminal hall suspended between them.
sentences.chinese: 渐近线设计的特点是两座塔间延展的终端展堂。

sentences.english: The largest vendors of the system are UTStarcom and ZTE.
sentences.chinese: 小灵通终端最大的提供商是UT斯达康和中兴。

sentences.english: PhotoNews163 is a non-official client application of the 163. com photo news.
sentences.chinese: 视澜163是一款第三方提供的网易图片新闻终端。

sentences.english: True if the command used to handle this type of URL should be run in a terminal.
sentences.chinese: 若设定为真，处理此类网址的命令须在终端机执行。

sentences.english: Power loss in the inducer would trigger the deck's playback circuit.
sentences.chinese: 一旦引导器断电，终端的回放电路就会被触发。

sentences.english: The competition on the market of phosphate compound fertilizers is the competition of market terminals in substance.
sentences.chinese: 磷复肥市场的竞争实质是营销终端的竞争。

definition: operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
to access (a network)/to insert (a plug) into (a socket)
